class.name: AudioEffectSampleRate
class.brief_description: Adds a sample rate audio effect to an Audio bus.
class.description: Reduces the input audio's sample rate, without interpolating the output. Also known as "sample & hold", or a type of "bitcrush". [b]Note:[/b] To reduce an audio signal's bit depth, use the "LoFi" mode in [AudioEffectDistortion].

members.member: Linear fade between dry/wet signals. Value can range from 0 to 1.
Sample rate (in Hz) that input audio will be resampled to. Value must be at least 1, and should be less than [method AudioServer.get_mix_rate] to result in any audible effect.
